pageContext.claim: “We should’ve taken the oil. And if we took the oil, you wouldn’t have ISIS. And we would have had wealth.”
pageContext.analysis: In 2015, Iraq produced about 4 million barrels a day, enough crude oil to fill more than 700 Trump Towers. Securing all of the oil, including in northern Iraq where the Islamic State exists, would require a military force larger than the one that invaded Iraq in 2003. It would also be considered a war crime.
